title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * add notifications for file upload , prescription by @rash-27 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2070 * Adds support for phone number in HCX Create Patient Profile by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2319 * HCX: Adds "use" in patient profile's telecom by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2321 * Adds a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2310 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2322 * Fix Scribe on iOS by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2323 * HCX: Fix payor search filtering and claim supporting info category URL by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2325 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2326 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2327 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care/compare/v24.30.0...v24.31.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.31.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.31.0
text:
## What's Changed * Added primary color to selected section on consultation page fix #8186 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8188 * Removed View Discharge Patients button fix #8164 by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8184 * Added a last online filter for users by @skks1212 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8175 * Add popup to acknowledge discharge by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8211 * Enhancements to Camera Feed Component by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8140 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8210 * Fixes last active filter badge showing up when filters other than the last active filter is applied by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8215 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.31.0 | Minor Fix by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8217 * Production release v24.31.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8230 ## New Contributors * @NitinPSingh made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8188 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/compare/v24.30.1...v24.31.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.31.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.32.0
text:
## What's Changed * Run formatter on entire project by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8224 * Changes 'CONSULTATION NOTES' to 'GENERAL INSTRUCTIONS (ADVICE)' by @ahmedobaid23 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8216 * fix #8220 made date component responsive by @NitinPSingh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8223 * Adds prompt for ICD11 search field #8232 by @ahmedobaid23 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8233 * Consultation Form Enhancement: No home facility docs by @Jacobjeevan in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/7914 * Handle exceptions raised by the addSourceBuffer method by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8199 * Fix Incorrect error message for invalid QR code by @AnkurPrabhu in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/7588 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.32.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8238 * Production release v24.32.0 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8256 ## New Contributors * @ahmedobaid23 made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8216 * @Jacobjeevan made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/7914 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/compare/v24.31.0...v24.32.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.32.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.32.1
text:
## What's Changed * Disable abdm api calls when abdm is not enabled by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2340 * Staging release v24.32.1 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2341 * Production release v24.32.1 by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2342 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care/compare/v24.31.0...v24.32.1

title: v24.33.0
text:
## What's Changed * Update stale, to ignore backlog Issues & PRs by @gigincg in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8249 * scroll to mandatory empty fields by @kushalbhana in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8263 * Fix: Added online status to Doctor Connect by @Shelly011s in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8261 * Camera Feed: Ensure camera moves everytime the preset is clicked by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8254 * Live Feed: Move to last accessed preset instead of last created by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8255 * Increased Form Size & Updated Indicator Field by @renoseHarsh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8244 * Fixed: Misalignment of placeholder text inside date component in the ‚Ä¶ by @thevishvammoliya in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8240 * Fixed: Transfer patient pop-up behavior by @renoseHarsh in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8245 * Show weight and height as unspecified rather than 0 by @shivankacker in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8248 * Cypress: fix incorrect patient category select's id by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8267 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8269 * Adds support for printing üñ®Ô∏è prescriptions üíä by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8259 * Made Scribe work with Symptoms, Investigations, Diagnosis and Prescriptions by @shivankacker in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8183 * Fix Notifications for Facility Cover Image Deletion by @AnkurPrabhu in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/7609 * Added sorting for events by @khavinshankar in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8270 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.33.0 | Urgent User requirement patch | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8277 * üõ†Ô∏è Fixes issue with treating physician field being disabled when a search text entered yields no results; üõ†Ô∏è Migrate `UserAutocompleteFormField` to use `useQuery` by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8274 * Fixed date time format for edge cases by @shivankacker in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8280 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.33.0 | Patch for fixing two edge case bugs | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8282 * Replace deprecated LOC options in Neurological Monitoring table by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8291 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.33.0 | Patch for a bug in neurological monitor by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8292 * Production Release 24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8294 ## New Contributors * @kushalbhana made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8263 * @Shelly011s made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8261 * @renoseHarsh made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8244 * @thevishvammoliya made their first contribution in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8240 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/compare/v24.32.0...v24.33.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.33.0.

title: v24.33.0
text:
## What's Changed * events module: serialize only specific fields of related objects by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2324 * fix attribute error on null values in field serialization by @sainak in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2348 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2349 * Production Release 24.33.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care/pull/2351 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care/compare/v24.32.1...v24.33.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.33.0.
author: sainak

title: v24.34.0
text:
## What's Changed * Migrate rescript components to typescript; uninstall ReScript by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8316 * Skip commenting on stale issues and avoid auto-closing stale PRs by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8317 * Remove unused dependencies by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8318 * Merge Develop To Staging 24.34.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8319 * Camera Feed: Persist last accessed position or preset by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8320 * Merge Develop to Staging v24.34.0 | Patch to Enhance Camera Feed Experience | by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8322 * Fix Scribe erroring out by @shivankacker in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8331 * Fix Scribe erroring out (#8331) by @shivankacker in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8332 * Fix camera preset save button disable logic for cases of last moved position by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8345 * Merge Develop to Staging 24.34.0 | Patch by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8346 * Use abort controller for submit requests for patient and consultation create by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8354 * Treating physician: Fixes an edge case where clearing query leads to field getting disabled by @rithviknishad in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8355 * Merge Develop To Staging v24.34.0 | Patch by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8356 * Production release 24.34.0 by @nihal467 in https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/pull/8348 **Full Changelog**: https://github.com/coronasafe/care_fe/compare/v24.33.0...v24.34.0
This discussion was created from the release v24.34.0.
author: sainak
